LanguageData.FOU.Settings.Category.Label: Foreigner of Universe
LanguageData.FOU.Settings.Basic.Label: General
LanguageData.FOU.Settings.NanitesMaxStorage.Label: <color=#D09B61>Nanites</color> max storage capacity:
LanguageData.FOU.Settings.NanitesDailyReplication.Too: Configures the daily replication rate for <color=#D09B61>higher dimensional nanites</color>.
LanguageData.FOU.Settings.PhoenixRegenerationPerDay.T: Configures the daily physiological restoration capacity of <color=#D09B61>「Phoenix」</color>.
LanguageData.FOU.Settings.MatterRecoveryCost.Label: <color=#D09B61>Matter recovery</color> ability consumption:
LanguageData.FOU.Settings.MatterRecoveryCost.Tooltip: Configures the <color=#D09B61>higher dimensional nanites</color> cost for activating <color=#D09B61>matter recovery</color> ability.
LanguageData.FOU.Settings.NanitesPerKilogram.Label: Nanites per kilogram:
LanguageData.FOU.Settings.NanitesPerKilogram.Tooltip: Configures per kilogram of matter yield of <color=#D09B61>higher dimensional nanites</color> by <color=#D09B61>matter disintegration</color> ability.
LanguageData.FOU.Settings.KilogramsPerNanite.Label: Kilograms per nanite:
LanguageData.FOU.Settings.KilogramsPerNanite.Tooltip: Configures kilograms of matter per <color=#D09B61>higher dimensional nanites</color> for <color=#D09B61>matter weave</color> ability.
LanguageData.FOU.Settings.NanitesPerDamage.Label: Damage absorption rate:
LanguageData.FOU.Settings.NanitesPerDamage.Tooltip: Configures the <color=#D09B61>higher dimensional nanites</color> consumed per damage point absorbed by the <color=#D09B61>contravention barrier</color>.
LanguageData.FOU.Settings.IndiscriminateDisintegratio: Configures the <color=#D09B61>higher dimensional nanites</color> cost for activating <color=#D09B61>indiscriminate disintegration</color> ability.
Configures the damage per target inflicted by <color=#D09B61>indiscriminate disintegration</color>.
Configures the effective radius for <color=#D09B61>indiscriminate disintegration</color>.
LanguageData.FOU.Settings.RecoveryProgramCooldown.Too: Configures the cooldown for <color=#D09B61>Recovery program</color> from <color=#D09B61>「Phoenix」</color>.\n\nThe unit here is <color=#D09B61>Tick</color>, and 60,000 <color=#D09B61>Ticks</color> equal one in-game day.
Whether to hifr ability when characters multi selected.
LanguageData.FOU.Settings.ResetButton.Label: Reset
LanguageData.FOU.Settings.ResetButton.Tooltip: Resets the above options to default.
LanguageData.FOU.Settings.Protocols.Tooltip: Configure health conditions immunized by {0} protocol.
LanguageData.FOU.Settings.Protocols.ImmuneDiseases.Ad: Try to add new immunized health condition.
LanguageData.FOU.Settings.Protocols.ImmuneDiseases.In: DefName of health condition to add.
